720222f-b.text:
1-Greenwich Street, west side, and south west corner of
Laight Street, looking east wards.
2-Greenwich Street, west side end northwest corner of Laight
Street.
3-Laight Street, north side, west from Greenwich Street.
P. L. Sperr  May 3, 1941
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1,2,3
720222f-b.folder: Greenwich Street & Laight Street, Manhattan, NY
